name: TRIM
purpose: This function will return an A type field with the leading or trailing spaces deleted.

parts.description: The value to be converted. The original field is not changed.

'T' - trim trailing spaces; this is the default value.
'L' - trim leading spaces.

return_type: A If the receiving field is not long enough, the remaining characters will be truncated.
comments:
You would use this function when concantenating (adding) A type fields together. If the spaces aren’t trimmed, there will probably be extra spaces in the resulting value. This function can get rid of them.
You can also use the ‘*’ when concatenating the fields. For more information please see Chapter 1, Installation and General Information.
